articles.description: Two new studies suggest growing plants on Mars may be trickier than anticipated, and that’s a problem for anyone who wants to live there.

articles.author: Lia Rovira
articles.title: NASA’s moon rocket test Saturday didn’t go as planned - EarthSky
articles.description: This final test of NASA's SLS megarocket was needed to launch the first uncrewed mission in the Artemis program - Artemis 1 - by the end of 2021. Now the program's schedule is uncertain.

articles.author: Tom Fish
articles.title: NASA SLS test fire: Artemis 1 ‘mega rocket’ aborts Green Run hot fire - Daily Express
articles.description: NASA has ended a critical engine test early for a core stage of its cutting-edge rocket Space Launch System (SLS), the space agency has announced.

articles.author: Aaron Lim, The Conversation
articles.title: Deep-Sea Coral Reefs Found Surviving in Ireland at The Edge of a Submarine Canyon - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Most people associate the word "coral" with sunshine, blue skies and Australia's Great Barrier Reef. In fact, more than half of the 5,100 species on the planet exist as "cold-water corals" in deep and dark parts of the world's oceans.

articles.title: Dinosaur discovery: Fossils found in Argentina may have belonged to largest land animal - Daily Express
articles.description: DINOSAUR fossils unearthed in South America may belong to the largest land animal that scientists have ever found - so far.
